ROM.Changelog:
# Changelog
First initial release camera2api enabled SafetyNet Bypass enabled New System Animations [Fixed Animations lag] Say Welcome to dotOTA [up for mido] Added Magisk Preference Button in Settings / ROM Control Implemented Buttons Menu in ROM Control : Buttons / NavigationBar Enable/Disable and controls Updated Magsik to latest, no need to reflash for Safety Net Check [only for Mido] Added DotExtras QuickSettings section New Dialer, Gallery and MusicFX Icon Fingerprint authentication vibration Maybe many more
